concept.title: Metric Rules and Alerts
concept.shortdesc: Metric rules provide feedback on pipeline and stage performance, such as batch processing times.

conbody.p: metric rules and alertsoverviewmonitoringmetric rules and alertsWhen you enable a metric rule, it automatically enables an alert for the rule. Metric alerts display in the console in monitor mode. You can also configure a metric rule to send email alerts to all email addresses associated with the pipeline.
You can configure metric rules when you configure or monitor the pipeline. Metric rules take effect after you enable them.
The provides a set of metric rules for all pipelines. By default, they are not enabled. You can edit, delete, and enable the rules. You can also create custom metric rules.
